title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Strategist
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Strategist
We are looking for a results-driven Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Strategist to lead paid advertising initiatives across platforms like Facebook, Google, and TikTok. You will plan, launch, and scale campaigns that drive ROI while constantly optimizing for cost-efficiency and performance.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and manage paid media strategies tailored to business goals

Execute and monitor ad campaigns across Meta, Google, and TikTok

Analyze performance data and implement A/B tests to boost results

Collaborate with creative teams to align visuals and messaging with audience segments

Requirements:

1+ year of proven experience in performance marketing

Strong grasp of campaign structure, budget pacing, and KPIs (CPA, ROAS, CTR)

Proficiency with major ad platforms and tracking tools

Ability to turn data into actionable insights
